channel.title: chroot on Losinggeneration's Coding and Projects
channel.description: Recent content in chroot on Losinggeneration's Coding and Projects

item.title: Spam and Server stuff
item.description: So, I’ve only been up for about three weeks and I’ve already got my first spam comment (which is why I moderate all comments ATM.) Also, it was kind of strange, I went to go here at work today and I wasn’t able to connect. So, I logged into my router. I thought that my iptables were screwy again, so I started trying to fix them by hand. Deleted a rule and BAM no more connectivity to my router (at all.
